_description: English couplet describing the shepherds’ songs in a French picture Bible

BLAdd47682.Transcription: Songen alle wid one steueneAlso þe angel songe þat cam fro heuene
BLAdd47682.Note:
In the French text above the lower picture on the leaf, not on f. 17 as recorded in Boffey  and  Edwards (2005)
XJulia Boffey,   and  A. S. G. Edwards.  
             A New Index of Middle English Verse.
         London: The British Library, 2005.
